134923.「へへっ この帽子が気になるかい。\n こいつは ちょいと変わった帽子で かぶる:

Cap" that changes color when it is "liked". We at the companion use it to play hide-and-seek and oni-games, and
we make up our own rules. How do we use it? The chaser wears the Unknown Names Cap and the escaper wears the
Tag Cap. The escapee gets a "Like! and the hat changes color, the escapee is caught. These are the rules we set.
But the rules of this kind of game are up to us. You can think of some interesting rules with the people you
play with! Both hats are sold cheaply at the Item Shop, so get a bunch of companions together and play together!
Also, please note that the Unknown Names Cap will not work if you change its appearance by dressing it up or

181720.「いらっしゃいませ！\n こちらは 笑顔とまごころをお届けする\n きずなの窓口:

adventurers at any time. The letters you can view are for seasonal events, limited time events, and other events,
stories, quests, and so on. Also, when you throw away your letters, we will let you know in a message if you can
browse them at the Omoide P.O. Box. I will continue to support to make it more convenient and bring smiles to
all adventurers! See you soon!

184492.「いらっしゃいませ！\n こちらは 笑顔とまごころをお届けする\n きずなの窓口:
Welcome to our Post Office! This is Kizuna no Madoguchi Post Office, the window of the relationship that
delivers smiles and sincerity! The World Association of Lodgemakers would like to inform you of a change in the
mailing method of the SP Lottery Ticket that will be mailed to you when you win the third prize or more in the
Lottery. Until now, every time one of your friends won Lottery tickets of 3rd prize or higher, a letter was
mailed to you and it was overwhelming your mail box. However, from now on, only one SP Lottery Ticket letter will
be mailed at first when you win Lottery 3 or more. SP Lottery tickets from the same friend will then be
added to that letter until they are received from the mailbox. The maximum number of SP Lottery Ticket in one
letter is 99. If you receive more than 99 SP Lottery Ticket, another letter will be mailed to you. Please note
that the SP Lottery Ticket letters that have been left in your mailbox are already combined into one letter.
We will continue to support you to make it more convenient and bring smiles to all adventurers! See you
soon!

184493.「いらっちゃいまて！\n ここは えがおと まごころを とどける\n ゆうびんき:
We're here to serve you! This is a post office where you can roar your pictures and your heart! This is a
place where you can find pictures, words, and a heart! The mailboxes sent by friends who hit Lottery 3 will be
sent with a different mechanism! From now on, you will receive only one round of lottery tickets, which used
to be sent to you every other round! After that, if Lottery3 is held and the lottery ticket is sent to you, it
will be included in the lottery ticket! However, only 99 lots are allowed in a single lot, so you will
receive another lot in the next lot! And the Lottery Ken's handmails that have been left in the mailboxes have
also been sent to each of our friends! We are now able to do Lottery without worrying about our friends' mailboxes,
so please keep up the good work!
